Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Westbound Reroute near Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: Westbound 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose: due to, street blockage near Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose: due to, street blockage near Montrose/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
